sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import {fetchRepos} from './github_api' import {createPortal} from "react-dom"; export default function ReposModal({onClose, repo}) { const [repos, setRepos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetchRepos(repo).then( (r) => { setRepos(r) }) }, [member]); return createPortal(<>
Meet {name}
{bio}
{company}
Following : {following}
Followers : {followers}
, document.getElementById("modal-container") ); }
